amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt independent establishments from the requirements of Title II of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to exempt independent establishments from the requirements of Title II of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cummings.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
